name: Erik Dewhurst's Very Fine Game About Games (it's fine)
name_original: Erik Dewhurst's Very Fine Game About Games (it's fine)
description:
Enter a special art gallery with a 20 digit combination lock. If you can crack the code, you win.

This puzzle-game is part scavenger hunt, part ARG, and part interactive essay on game design.

It was my submission for the 2022 Global Game Jam. The theme was "Duality" and this game is an interactive analysis of the way information outside of video games can interact with a puzzle game.
